edu.smcm.ai.search

Class AdversarialState

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.smcm.ai.search.State
      • edu.smcm.ai.search.AdversarialState
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TicTacToeState

    public abstract class AdversarialState
extends State
    State in an Adversarial Game. We are using the schema described on p.162 of Artificial Intelligence: A Modern Approach by Russell and Norvig. However, we have chosen to creat an additional class AdversarialGame that includes the initial state. This is to make the structure of the classes more like that for classical search (@see Search). TODO Either remove the methods in this class or make AdversarialGame a pass-through class

        Returns:
